name: Trolley
description:
A choice-driven story unfolds in an MMORPG!

◆Synopsis
The protagonist is an ordinary high school student like any other.
One day, he is introduced to an online game called "Trolley Online" by an acquaintance.
Immersed in the game, he becomes the top player, but at the cost of becoming a truant.
Although he understands that his current situation is not ideal, the game world shines brighter than the real world.
While grappling with such worries, he encounters a mysterious NPC named "Heart Emilia" while playing "Trolley Online" today.
And that encounter leads to an unexpected turn of events...

◆A classic 2D action RPG
Solve puzzles in each stage and defeat approaching enemies!
Also, witness for yourself who the enigmatic NPC "Heart Emilia" really is!

◆Stylish evasive actions
Deal massive damage by attacking at the precise moment you dodge the enemy's incoming attacks!
Anticipate every attack and stylishly defeat your enemies!

◆Multiple endings
The protagonist's choices will alter the endings!
Can you make the best choices...!?
